lyrics:
Young hearts
I believe that we are not far
From becoming who
we truly are
love is on its way

dreamers
you see everything in color
while the world
is getting darker
love is on its way

so, hold on another day
cause love is on its way
you'll find it's going to be okay
cause love is on its way
it's alright
you'll find
a brighter day
cause love is on its way

oooooohhhh

leaders
show us how to love each other
it could help us to recover
love is on its way

lonely
I believe that you will find me
and together we will truly see
that love is on its way
yeahhhh

so, hold on another day
cause love is on its way
you'll find it's gonna to be okay
cause love is on its way
it's alright
you'll find
a brighter day
because love is on its way

yeahhh
yeahhh
hold on another day
cause love is on its way
you'll find it's going to be okay
cause love is on its way

it's alright
you'll find 
a brighter day
because love is on its way

cause love is on its way
cause love
is on it's
way
